name: World of Warships: Legends — Lend-Lease Raider
name_original: World of Warships: Legends — Lend-Lease Raider
description:
A U.S. Navy Destroyer turned British! Inconceivable! Campbeltown is a curious destroyer with surprisingly powerful torpedoes — don't underestimate her!

This pack contains: - Campbeltown Tier II ship - 3 Premium Days

Note: this pack comes with 10 Halloween camos as a bonus!

Doubloons will be given as compensation for duplicate Premium ships.
